statements: UPDATE user_activity SET browser_history = '{"last_visited": "www.example.com"}', purchase_history = '{}' WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3d4-1234-5678-90ab-cdef12345678';
UPDATE user_activity SET purchase_history = '{"last_purchase": "Product A"}', browser_history = '{}' WHERE user_id = '9876fedc-ba09-8765-4321-dcba09876543';
UPDATE user_activity SET browser_history = '{"last_visited": "www.example.com", "visits": 10}' WHERE user_id = 'c7b2b2bb-74d3-4c13-b52e-4ea8b3b28304';
UPDATE user_activity SET purchase_history = '{"products": ["product1", "product2"], "total_amount": 150}' WHERE user_id = 'e83e3c7c-0e60-41d4-bd99-869e0a3c78a1';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type='login' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE users SET username='John Doe', email='johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_activity SET timestamp='2022-05-27 10:15:00', activity_type='Login' WHERE activity_id=1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE products SET price = 20.5, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET email = 'updated_email@example.com', username = 'updated_username' WHERE user_id = 'f2c4538a-87a2-4b2f-9b51-b571d12c454e';
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, product_name = 'New Product Name' WHERE product_id = 'cfe13406-97bc-4c85-b75d-6cf5e53c3d10';
UPDATE user_profile SET name='John Doe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE purchase_history SET quantity=3, timestamp='2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id=1 AND product_id=100;
UPDATE browsing_history SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = 101 AND product_id = 201;
UPDATE product_catalog SET price = 99.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 301;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 29.99, description = 'New Description' WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET username='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=19.99, description='New and improved version' WHERE product_id=5;
